scripts.prerender-html: node scripts/prerender-html.js && node src/server/prerender.tmp.js && rm src/server/prerender.tmp.js
scripts.start: rm -rf build && mkdir build && yarn concurrently 'yarn prerender-html' 'yarn prerender-css' && node scripts/start.js
scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && yarn concurrently 'yarn prerender-html' 'yarn prerender-css' && NODE_ENV=production node scripts/build.js
